leadingComments.value:
*
 * Replaces all occurrences of '&', '<', '>', '"' and "'" in text
 * with their 'safe' counterparts (such as '&').
 * 
 * @param {string} text The text to be sanitized
 * 
 * @return {string} The sanitized text
